row.sql_oracle: select depl_package || ':' || pkg_type as pkg from UC4DEP.RCH_PACKAGES where status in(1,2) and 1=(SELECT (CASE WHEN 'INSTALL' = '&ACTION#' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ISSUES from dual) and depl_package like '%&PKGFILTER#%' union select package_name || '-' || package_version || ':' || b.pkg_type as pkg from UC4DEP.RCH_INSTALLED_PACKAGES a, UC4DEP.RCH_PACKAGES b where (package_name like '%&PKGFILTER#%' or package_version like '%&PKGFILTER#%') and 0=(SELECT (CASE WHEN 'INSTALL' = '&ACTION#' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ISSUES from dual) and package_name || '-' || package_version = B.DEPL_PACKAGE order by pkg
